long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LinkedIn email finder - connect with your prospects in seconds!!
The most effective email finder and verification tool to help you boost your LinkedIn outreach. 
Find your contacts personal and business email addresses with a single click.

WHY KENDO?
- Kendo email finder database has over 850 million emails
- Supports LinkedIn Recruiter and Sales Navigator
- All emails provided are double verified and 97% accurate
- Domain email search - reveal emails by a company or domain
- Bulk lookup - upload list of contacts and find email addresses in bulk.
- Enrich emails with contact and company details (reverse email lookup)
- Powerful REST API that seamlessly integrates with your existing apps
- Instagram email hunter (the only email extract tool on the market to help you automate your lead generation from Instagram)
- Enrich and export the leads you found to CSV, Excel or JSON files.
- Share your account with additional team members at no additional charge.
- 50 free credits for email lookup every month!
- Various plans to fit your needs, starting from only $17 per month!


Privacy disclaimer and permissions: 
Kendo requires the following chrome permissions:
1. read & write kendo.com - to communicate with our server and perform searches.
2. read & write linkedin.com - to read public social profile data and use it to search for contact
information.
3. background - communicate with our server and perform searches
4. storage - store user preferences
